roleset.name: make used to something unpleasant, habituate

role.descr: entity that becomes habituated to something unpleasant
unpleasantness that arg1 has to get used to

example.name: Usually passive, descriptive
example.text: Fast-forward to [today's G.I.]-1: *PRO*-1 inured *none* to violence by a lifetime of ultra-violent "Kill Bill" movies...

predicate.note: Frames file for 'inure' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'accustom.'
